StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCareerFairEvent]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
--@PointOfContactID integer, --@En.tyTypeID integer AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN --ContactName is a generalize name for any person or place SELECT
--These columns may be needed by the data contracts for insert/update oe.[FiscalYear], e.[EventID], e.[EventType], e.[EventName] AS CareerFairName,
ec.[Coordina.onBeginDate] AS Registra.onDeadline,
-- Will refer to mul.ple date entries cfe.[EventDateID],
eco.[Cost],
-- As per analyst at present make it free format text 200 eco.[Adver.singInfo],
RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) + ',' + RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) + '.' + IsNull(substring(pc.POCLegalMiddleName,1,1),'') + '.' AS POCName, [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName], [POCFirstName], [TelephoneNumber],[FaxNumber]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[GetCareerFairEvent] cfe inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Organiza.onEvent] oe ON cfe.Organiza.onEventID = oe.Organiza.onEventID inner join [MCRISS].[USMC].[Event] e ON e.EventID = oe.EventID le. join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventCoordina.on] ec ON ec.Coordina.onEventID = oe.Coordina.onEventID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.PointOfContactID = oe.PointOfContactID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventCost] eco ON oe.EventCostID = oe.EventCostID le. outer join [MCRISS].[USMC].[EventDate] ed ON oe.EventDateID = oe.EventDateID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
